name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Proficient in **backend development** and **frontend development**, I am a seasoned Full Stack Developer with 8 years of experience specializing in the creation and coordination of high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors. I possess a strong grasp of **authorization systems** including **RBAC**, **ABAC**, and **ReBAC**, ensuring seamless access control across applications. My technical expertise extends to building robust internal tooling and improving workflows, complemented by a solid foundation in system documentation and infrastructure scaling.

With proficiency in a modern tech stack featuring **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, **Django**, and deep cloud knowledge across **Azure** and **AWS**, I have successfully led the development of enterprise-grade platforms that leverage AI/ML for analytics and automation. My experience in **microservices architecture**, event-driven systems, and **CI/CD** automation empowers me to build secure applications compliant with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Additionally, I have practical experience developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, all while maintaining effective communication and proactive organization for successful project outcomes.
